metadata.title: CVE-2024-1013 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds stack write flaw was found in unixODBC on 64-bitarchitectures where the caller has 4 bytes and callee writes 8 bytes. Thisissue may go unnoticed on little-endian architectures, while big-endianarchitectures can be broken.

criterions.comment: unixodbc package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
